meanings.definition: A framework of metal bars used as a cover for an opening
meanings.sent1: The grille on the window kept the bugs out.
meanings.sent2: The chef cooked burgers on the grille.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the grille but got stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her tears blurred the world outside the grille of her prison.
meanings.sent5: The grille rattled in the wind, creating an eerie sound.

meanings.definition: A cooking surface with parallel metal bars
meanings.sent1: Dad grilled chicken on the grille for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The grille on the barbecue sizzled with heat.
meanings.sent3: The grille became a hot seat for the sausages.
meanings.sent4: The grille transformed the raw meat into a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the grille filled the backyard with mouth-watering scents.

meanings.definition: A decorative pattern of parallel bars or lines
meanings.sent1: The grille design on the gate was intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The car had a stylish grille at the front.
meanings.sent3: She doodled a grille pattern on her notebook during class.
meanings.sent4: The grille of the fence cast interesting shadows in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The grille of the radiator added a touch of elegance to the room.
